comments:
I20070724-0800

NPE when using Show In > ... in Java editor on repository file (old revision from CVS history):

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-07-25 15:25:43.546
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.core.runtime.AssertionFailedException: null argument:
        at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isNotNull(Assert.java:84)

        at org.eclipse.ui.PlatformUI.createAndRunWorkbench(PlatformUI.java:149)
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.ide.application.IDEApplication.start(IDEApplication.java:106)
        at org.eclipse.equinox.internal.app.EclipseAppHandle.run(EclipseAppHandle.java:169)

Nicest solution would have been to not show 'Package Explorer' in the Show In list but that's not possible as this is contributed from outside via XML.

Besides the AFE which has been introduced with 3.3, Show In > Outline which worked in 3.2 also got broken.

We need to fix this for 3.3.1.

Fixed in HEAD.
Available in builds > N20070725-0010.
